title: Search for Off-Market Properties
description: In a competitive market, a buyer client asks their agent to find potential off-market properties (pocket listings).

tasks.description: Post an inquiry to the brokerage's internal network or private agent groups about potential upcoming listings matching the buyer's criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: A message is posted to the company's Slack channel and a local agent Facebook group.

tasks.description: Search the brokerage's internal 'coming soon' or 'private exclusive' listings database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the internal system for any properties that are not yet on the public MLS.

tasks.description: Contact agents who frequently list properties in the desired neighborhood to ask about any unlisted inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and sends emails to 5 top agents in the target area.
